name: Save new YouCanBook.me bookings to a Google Sheets spreadsheet and watch for reschedulations at regular intervals
description: Make at regular intervals watches new or rescheduled bookings and automatically add that bookings info to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. You can use this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10tYzkqwF1Yad0wAcGAMeLKqjS8VWMrYiSkH4zyplq_0/edit?usp=sharing).
